name: Animal Jam - Play Wild!
description: In Play Wild, you can become your favorite animal, collect amazing items, adopt adorable pets, and create a style to express the real you as you explore the beautiful 3D world of Jamaa!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R4 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 515 MB available space
